title: The Abduction of Ydoire
description: The Abduction of Ydoire; Loyset Liédet (Flemish, active about 1448 - 1478), and Pol Fruit (Flemish, active about 1468); Illuminated: Bruges, Belgium; written 1463 - 1465; illuminated 1467 - 1472; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and gold paint on parchment; Leaf: 23.2 x 18.8 cm (9 1/8 x 7 3/8 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIII 6, leaf 1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
